## Web3sdksSDKProvider variable

A basic wrapper around the Web3sdks SDK.

You can use this in order to be able to pass a provider &amp; signer directly to the SDK.

**Signature:**

```typescript
Web3sdksSDKProvider: ComponentWithChildren<Web3sdksSDKProviderProps>;
```

## Remarks

Utilizing this provider will mean hooks for wallet management are not available, if you need those please use the [Web3sdksProvider](./react.web3sdksprovider.md) instead.
